members.name: start
members.comment: Called when a start tag is seen for the type of tag this action was registered to. The tag argument indicates the actual tag for those actions that are shared across many tags. By default this does nothing and completely ignores the tag.

members.name: end
members.comment: Called when an end tag is seen for the type of tag this action was registered to. The tag argument indicates the actual tag for those actions that are shared across many tags. By default this does nothing and completely ignores the tag.

name: javax.swing.text.html.HTMLDocument$HTMLReader$TagAction
comment: An action to be performed in response to parsing a tag. This allows customization of how each tag is handled and avoids a large switch statement.
